Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Explore the variety of lighting possibilities and creative concepts using constructed set and studio lighting and experimental techniques.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Concepts necessary for operation of a photography studio. Includes legal, ethical issues; marketing; selfpromotion strategies; funding opportunities; professional development; and professional presentation.

Course Description.text: An exploration of the photograph in narrative form. Story, research and visual style will be addressed incorporating historical and contemporary social and documentary photographers.

Course Description.text: Exploration of imagery created to illustrate articles, including still-life, portrait, documentary, and/or fashion photography. Emphasis on the creation of multiple or consecutive images.
